personalInfo.splInterest: Watching sports, hanging out with friends

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished 150 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played in 13 Web.com Tour events, making one cut, resulting in a T48 at the BMW Charity Pro-Am...On the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada, made five starts and recorded two top-five finishes. Shot rounds of 67-67-68-67 to claim T2 at the Great Waterway Classic. Three weeks later, posted four more rounds in the 60s that led to a T5 at the Freedom 55 Financial Championship...Played in two 2014-15 PGA TOUR events, the Barracuda Championship in August and the Frys.com Open in October. Missed the cut in both. In 2015-16, Monday qualified for the Frys.com Open in October. Missed the cut (69-77).

2014: Finished T21 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Played on the eGolf Professional Tour and garnered a win at the Armwood Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Three-time Sacramento Valley League MVP in golf from 2007-09...Two-time SVL all-league in basketball (2008-09)...Named the 2013 West Coast Conference Co-Player of the Year with BYU's Zac Blair, a current PGA TOUR player. Won the 2012 WCC individual title and was a two-time first-team All-WCC choice in 2012 and 2013 to go with honorable mention in 2011.
tourBios.personal: First-tee entrance song would be "Waves" by Mr. Probz...Earliest golf memory was "taking an adult's money on my outdoor putting green as a kid."...Best single sporting event ever attended was Game 1 of the 2012 World Series where Pablo Sandoval hit three home runs to lead the San Francisco Giants to victory...Enjoys watching the San Francisco Giants and Pac-12 football...Lists his favorite restaurants as In & Out Burger, Chipotle and Chick-fil-A. and his top athlete to watch is Madison Bumgarner...Not many people know he doesn't have a golf instructor...Motto is "Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard."...Wants to be featured in ESPN the Magazine or Sports Illustrated because he loves sports. Favorite TV show is "The League."...Favorite golf course played is Spyglass Hill...Hopes to play Augusta National and Cypress Point some day...Would like to be LeBron James for a day to experience the media attention he receives daily...Favorite entertainers are Luke Bryan and Blake Shelton...Would like to attend a Duke-North Carolina basketball game one day...Grew up playing a nine-hole golf course and still practices there...Twitter handle is @bengeyer91.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T48th in 2015 at the BMW Charity Pro-Am Presented by SYNNEX Corporation.
